byline.contributor: Christine Hauser, Marc Santora and Nate Schweber contributed reporting.

abstract: Approach of Hurricane Joaquin has set communities in New York and New Jersey devastated by Hurricane Sandy on edge; residents and local and state officials in region are taking as many precautions as possible to prevent kind of damage that occurred in 2012's devastating hurricane.
lead_paragraph: East Coast communities devastated by Hurricane Sandy three years ago are preparing for the prospect that a new storm may bring heavy rains, strong winds and flooding.

headline.main: Storm-Battered Towns Watch Hurricane Joaquin’s Forecast With Anxiety
headline.print_headline: Coastal Towns Anxiously Watch a Storm’s Forecast

snippet: East Coast communities devastated by Hurricane Sandy three years ago are preparing for the prospect that a new storm may bring heavy rains, strong winds and flooding.
